# couchbase-capella_app_endpoint_resync (Data Source)

Resync status of the given App Endpoint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_endpoint_name` (String) The name of the app endpoint.
- `app_service_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the app service.
- `cluster_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the cluster.
- `organization_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the organization.
- `project_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the project.

### Read-Only

- `collections_processing` (Map of Set of String) A map of collections currently being processed during the resync operation.
- `docs_changed` (Number) The number of documents that have been changed during the resync operation.
- `docs_processed` (Number) The number of documents that have been processed during the resync operation.
- `last_error` (Number) The last error that occurred during the resync operation.
- `start_time` (String) The timestamp when the resync operation was initiated.
- `state` (String) The current state of the resync operation.
